app.name: WIIU USB Helper Transfer Tool
app.short_description: Transfer games downloaded from WIIU U USB Helper
app.long_description: WIIU USB Helper Transfer Tool is a mod of both FTPIIU everywhere and WUP Installer. It enables you to receive games downloaded with WII U USB Helper and install them right away. The FTPIUU server has been improved and allows for better transfer speed. Make sure to enable IOSUHAX!
